author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
It's been more than a day since Nintendo's deep dive into the new Switch 2 and its software lineup. The consensus seems to be that it's more powerful than expected, but also way more expensive than most people thought, especially for games. Mario Kart World will retail for a whopping $79.99 in the U.S. (and more for physical copies in different regions). What does this mean for Grand Theft Auto 6? A release date hasn't been announced, and this could very well be an $80 game. Would you pay that much for GTA 6? In other news, Xbox's Game Pass Wave 1 for April has been revealed, headlined by South of Midnight. And finally, pets are coming to InZOI.
title: What Mario Kart World's Price Could Mean For GTA 6 - IG Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves trailer to see the reveal that DJ artist Salvatore Ganacci is coming to the fighting game. Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store) on April 24, 2025.

In addition to his role supervising the collaboration that is bringing 11 world-renowned DJs' music to Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves, Salvatore Ganacci will not only be contributing original music, but also entering the ring himself as a playable character.
title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves × Salvatore Ganacci - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Launch Trailer for South of Midnight, an action-adventure RPG developed by Compulsion Games. Players will explore the Deep South mythos and learn the power of ancient weaving. Fight deadly beasts, overcome obstacles, and unravel a family's hidden past. South of Midnight is available now with the Premium Edition for Early Access with the full launch on April 8 for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam).
title: South of Midnight - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Krypto, take us home. Check out this Superman clip from the upcoming DC Studios film from director James Gunn. Superman stars David Corenswet (“Twisters,” “Hollywood”) in the dual role of Superman/Clark Kent, Rachel Brosnahan (“The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel”) as Lois Lane and Nicholas Hoult (the “X-Men” movies, “Juror #2”) as Lex Luthor. 

The film also stars Edi Gathegi (“For All Mankind”), Anthony Carrigan (“Barry,” “Gotham”), Nathan Fillion (the “Guardians of the Galaxy” films, “The Suicide Squad”), Isabela Merced (“Alien Romulus”), Skyler Gisondo (“Licorice Pizza,” “Booksmart”), Sara Sampaio (“At Midnight”), María Gabriela de Faría (“The Moodys”), Wendell Pierce (“Selma,” “Tom Clancy’s Jack Ryan”), Alan Tudyk (“Andor”), Pruitt Taylor Vince (“Bird Box”) and Neva Howell (“Greedy People”).

DC Studios heads Peter Safran and Gunn are producing the film, which Gunn directs from his own screenplay, based on characters from DC, Superman created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster.

Superman is
title: Superman - Official Sneak Peek Clip (2025) David Corenswet, Rachel Brosnahan, Nicholas Hoult

Players will be able to listen to the classic soundtracks of Dune 1 and Dune 2 via an in-game radio station for the nostalgic feel of an older rendition. Dune: Awakneing is launching on May 20 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#DuneAwakening #Dune #Gaming

author: IGN
description:
Watch the official Phineas and Ferb trailer for the return of the legendary animated show from Disney. Follow the adventures of Phineas and Ferb on a new season of the hit show that follows the shenanigans and dilemmas of their Summer vacation. Candace is more determined than ever to finally bust her little brothers, while their pet platypus, Perry, continues to lead a double life as the suave “Agent P,” whose sole mission is to thwart Dr. Doofenshmirtz from taking over the Tri-State Area. The new season of Phineas and Ferb will premiere on June 5 on Disney Channel and on June 6 on Disney Plus.

#Disney #PhineasAndFerb #Trailer
title: Phineas and Ferb - Official Trailer (2025) Vincent Martella, David Errigo Jr., Ashley Tisdale

author: IGN
description:
Meet Sciel, the Cheerful and Serene Warrior, in this latest Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 trailer for the upcoming RPG. Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X|S, Steam and Epic Games Store on April 24, 2025.

A farmer turned teacher, Sciel is warm and outgoing, enjoying life day by day. She is at ease with death, having long accepted the brutality of their world. But her teasing smile masks a dark and painful past. Though deeply committed to the Expedition, she is untroubled by the specter of failure. They will do all in their power, and it will either be enough, or it won’t.

#ClairObscurExpedition33 #Gaming #Games
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Official Sciel Character Trailer

Players can join Creative Director Guangguang and Lead Combat Designer Zhiyong as they unveil the upcoming changes and new content for Season 2 of Marvel Rivals. Emma Frost and Ultron join the roster alongside new maps, team-up updates, and ranked adjustments for the Hellfire Gala Season. Season 2 of Marvel RIvals launches on April 11 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

description:
The single most important Naked Gun movie since the other Naked Gun movies. Check out The Naked Gun teaser trailer for this upcoming comedy movie starring Liam Neeson, Pamela Anderson, Paul Walter Hauser, CCH Pounder, Kevin Durand, Cody Rhodes, Liza Koshy, Eddie Yu, with Danny Huston. The Naked Gun opens in theaters on August 1, 2025.

Frank Drebin Jr. (Liam Neeson) follows in his father's footsteps in The Naked Gun, directed by Akiva Schaffer (Saturday Night Live, Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping) and from producer Seth MacFarlane (Ted, Family Guy).

description: Don't miss the PC Launch Trailer for The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered developed by Naughty Dog, Nixxes Software, and Iron Galaxy. Players will experience the critically acclaimed sequel like never before with PC optimizations such as widescreen support, upscaling software support with DLSS 3 and AMD FSR3.1, frame generation, and more. The game is also fitted with new updates to the fan-favorite No Return mode, including new characters and maps. The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered is available now for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered - Official PC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Endless Expeditions Spring 2025 Update Trailer for Pacific Drive, a first-person driving survival adventure game developed by Ironwood Studio. Players will soon be able to access new content and features for the game including a new roguelike-style mode called Endless Expeditions that allows for unlimited routes with increasing difficulty. The update is also packed with new maps, spawning systems, improved tools, and more for new and returning players to enjoy the Olympic Exclusion Zone. The Endless Expeditions Spring 2025 Update for Pacific Drive is launching on April 3 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Pacific Drive - Official Endless Expeditions Spring 2025 Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the official M3GAN 2.0 trailer for the sequel to the horror thriller film franchise distributed by Blumhouse Productions and Universal Pictures.
 
Two years after M3GAN, a marvel of artificial intelligence, went rogue and embarked on a murderous (and impeccably choreographed) rampage and was subsequently destroyed, M3GAN’s creator Gemma has become a high-profile author and advocate for government oversight of A.I. Meanwhile, Gemma’s niece Cady, now 14, has become a teenager, rebelling against Gemma’s overprotective rules. 
 
Unbeknownst to them, the underlying tech for M3GAN has been stolen and misused by a powerful defense contractor to create a military-grade weapon known as Amelia, the ultimate killer infiltration spy. But as Amelia’s self-awareness increases, she becomes decidedly less interested in taking orders from humans. Or in keeping them around. 
 
With the future of human existence on the line, Gemma realizes that the only option is to resurrect M3GAN and give her a
title: M3GAN 2.0 - Official Trailer (2025) Jenna Davis, Allison Williams

author: IGN
description:
Check out our The First Berserker: Khazan review by John Carson on Xbox Series X, also available on PC and PS5 (PlayStation 5).

Once you find your foothold and gain some abilities, the devastating The First Beserker: Khazan bosses start to shine. They’re the reason to play this brutal but impressive soulslike, and they only get better and more mechanically satisfying as you go deeper into The First Berserker: Khazan gameplay. It can be a steep and demoralizing climb, especially in the early hours, but there’s an exhilaration in executing split-second guards and dodges in order to escape relentless attacks before hitting foes with your own flurry of steel. The First Berserker: Khazan might be the hardest game you’ll play this year, but learning to take on the worst this soulslike has to offer at the start imbues you with the confidence to press on. The journey is tough, and it won’t be for everyone – but with time and practice, it’s well worth seeing it through.

#TheFirstBerserkerKh
title: The First Berserker: Khazan Review

author: IGN
description:
Watch our inZOI review (Early Access) by Sarah Thwaites on PC.

inZOI is by no means perfect, but it is impressive. Its Early Access launch is a mish-mash of unfinished ideas and engaging mechanics, and I’m still finding little surprises 30 hours in. The character creator and build mode are already complex and relatively user-friendly, and the Karma system is a clever way to introduce drama into the world, but inconsistent behaviours across its uncanny locations and conversation topics don’t put those good ideas in the best light. What’s available right now is an enticing slice of something that could eventually be great. It’s worthwhile enough already if your main interest is curating realistic dioramas to pose your custom Zois in like dolls. However, if you're looking for the moment-to-moment depth of something like The Sims, you’ll need to let Krafton keep cooking for some time yet.

What did you think of our IGN inZOI Early Access review featuring lots of inZOI gameplay? Let us k
title: inZOI Early Access Review

author: IGN
description:
Blumhouse’s box-office horror phenomenon Five Nights at Freddy’s, the highest-grossing horror film of 2023, is back. Five Nights at Freddy's 2 is directed by acclaimed returning filmmaker Emma Tammi (The Wind, Blood Moon) and will feature Matthew Lillard, Elizabeth Lail, Josh Hutcherson, and Piper Rubio.

Five Nights at Freddy’s is based on the game series created by Scott Cawthon, who also has a screenwriting credit on Five Nights at Freddy's 2.
title: Five Nights at Freddy's 2 - Official Teaser (2025) Matthew Lillard, Elizabeth Lail, Josh Hutcherson

author: IGN
description:
My Hero Academia: Vigilantes begins streaming on Crunchyroll on April 7! 

Koichi Haimawari is a dull college student who aspires to be a hero but has given up on his dream. Although 80% of the world’s population has superhuman powers called Quirks, few are chosen to become heroes and protect people. Everything changes for Koichi when he and Pop☆Step are saved by the vigilante Knuckleduster and get recruited to become vigilantes themselves!
title: My Hero Academia: Vigilantes - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
April’s Nintendo Direct had a full blowout on all things coming to out on the Nintendo Switch 2 release and shortly thereafter. Along with a slew of first party titles like Mario Kart World and Donkey Kong Bananza, Nintendo brought with them a ton of third party publishers to show off the biggest games coming to Nintendo Switch. The Duskbloods is heavily thought to be a Bloodborne sequel from the developers of the much beloved PlayStation game by From Software. That’s not the only From Software game highlighted in the Direct, as From Software also made it a point to show that Elden Ring will too be making its way to Switch 2. In a surprise twist, Hollow Knight: Silksong also made a very brief appearance assuring fans that the game is on track to release in 2025.

Since the Nintendo Switch 2 will be capable of playing games at 4K, 60fps with up to 120fps at 1080p, the console will also take select games from the Switch 1 and give them a upgrade to help them perform better. The Legend
title: Everything Announced at the Switch 2 Nintendo Direct

author: IGN
description:
In Neighborhood Watch, Simon (Quaid), a young man grappling with mental illness, becomes convinced that he has witnessed an abduction. When he reports it to the police and they refuse to believe him, he reluctantly seeks the help of his neighbor Ed (Morgan), a jaded, retired security guard with his own troubled past. As the unlikely duo delves deeper into the mystery, their pursuit of the truth forces them to confront not only the dark secrets surrounding the disappearance but also the unspoken wounds that haunt them both.

#IGN #Movies
title: Neighborhood Watch - Official Trailer (2025) Jack Quaid, Jeffrey Dean Morgan
